name: Cat Town
description:
Game introduction
Here you will become a cat living in the wild,
Adopt more cats, breed better offspring,
Reasonable arrangement of tasks and resources


Game Features

changing weather
Over a dozen cat breeds to choose from
Manage other cats, assign tasks
A variety of furniture and various interesting functional props, allowing everyone to play in a different style
Very real NPCs offering various services


Other
After the game is officially released, a large number of gameplay will be opened in turn, which is definitely worth the money.
